title: Truthlovecoins
author: Truthlovecoins
content: I was just wondering, one reason that has been overlooked as to why BTC has remained a dominant value of exchange to those who have come to accept it is, the advent of the internet and the idea of cryptocurrencies being on a block chain network which operates on the internet or online as fondly called. As long as institutions in the country are dependent on the internet or web to transact and carry on with daily trades and commerce, cryptocurrencies would remain a feature that would  keep getting audience and users. No matter how the government tries to ban or limit the use of cryptocurrencies, the main option should be to stop the internet from functioning. I bet this can't happen, as the disaster bound to happen would be tremendous.
